name: Church of God et al. v. Church of God et al., Appellants
name_abbreviation: Church of God v. Church of God

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
parties: Church of God et al. v. Church of God et al., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Opinion Per Curiam,
The decree of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Case; appellants to pay the costs.
opinions.author: Opinion Per Curiam,

attorneys: Frank B. Crow, Jr., with him Henderson, Par shall & Crow and D. W. Henderson, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Church of God et al. v. Church of God et al., Appellants.
Argued November 26, 1946.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
Wade K. Newell, for appellants.
Frank B. Crow, Jr., with him Henderson, Par shall & Crow and D. W. Henderson, for appellees.
January 6, 1947:
